metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0855 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The _mediaLibraryPlayCb function in mainwindow.py in pitivi before 0.95 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via shell metacharacters in a file path.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0855` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

pitivi - 0.95-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pitivi package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.95-1').
